PH007 - An Appeal to Our Churches in Behalf of Home Missionary Work (1896)


By Mrs. E. G. White

		It Is the Duty of the Church to Let Its Light Shine

     Christ, the True Witness, addresses the church at Ephesus, saying: "I have somewhat against thee, because thou hast left thy first love. Remember therefore from whence thou art fallen, and repent, and do the first works; or else I will come unto thee quickly, and will remove thy candlestick out of his place, except thou repent."
